text: The Brihan Maharashtra Sugar Syndicate Ltd. is an Indian sugar company in Pune, India. The company was created in 1934 by Chandrashekhar Agashe, who served as its managing director till his death in 1956. His oldest son, Panditrao Agashe served as managing director of the company from 1956 until he died in 1983. After which, Agashe's younger son, Dnyaneshwar Agashe, served as managing director of the company until 1996. He served as the chairman of the syndicate until he died in 2009. Agashe's grandson, Ashutosh Agashe has been managing director at the company since 17 December 1996. == References == Category:1930s establishments in India Category:1934 establishments in Asia Category:Companies of India Category:Pune
title: Brihan Maharashtra Sugar Syndicate Ltd.
